What are the significant relationships and events involving the characters in *The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn – Part 1*?

A. A) Carlisle treats Bella during her pregnancy.
B. B) Jacob performs CPR on Bella when her heart stops.

Correct Answer: A) Carlisle treats Bella during her pregnancy., B) Jacob performs CPR on Bella when her heart stops., C) Jacob initially wants to kill Renesmee.
